articles.title: 'Many IPL teams had opportunity to buy me but they didn’t believe in me': Kohli - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Virat Kohli, who has been a part of RCB since the inception of IPL back in 2008, said many franchises had the opportunity to pick him but nobody backed him at the start of his career or had belief in his abilities like the way RCB did.
articles.content: Virat Kohli, the only cricketer to play all 15 seasons of the Indian Premier League (IPL) for one team - The Royal Challengers Bangalore - has opened up on his loyalty for RCB. Kohli, who has been a … [+3398 chars]
